title: Legal Binding of Jason & Di-Ann
name: Legal Binding of Jason & Di-Ann
description:
A Map by Deisnor

Things we need to think about and keep track of.

properties.name: Beauty Sleep Inn
properties.description: Posted by Nerdletta   3625 SE Taylor Portland OR 97214Do you like things that sparkle, unicorns, Liberace, music, dancing, crafting, decorating, singing, drinking, cocktail parties, fancy dresses, disco balls, pictures of fluffy kittens or baby goats, things that plug in and light up, white shag carpet, vintage furniture, vintage jewelry and shoes and dresses?... the list goes on but you get the picture. The ideal houseguest would be someone just like me. So much like me, in fact, that we could start a girl-gang. That\'s what Beauty Sleep is essentially all about... a private themed residence where you can feel pretty and safe. THE PLACE: Formerly a huge house split up into 4 separate apartments. In the heart of Belmont/Hawthorne district and walking distance to everything. I\'ve converted the main floor into common space that everyone can enjoy. So you get the best of both worlds - privacy, minimal sharing of bathrooms/kitchens, and lots of super-fun common space. A room for your every whim, every inclination. Why not sing, dance, hula-hoop and glue things to other things! THE ROOMS: Every bedroom (and there are 4 for rent weekly, monthly,... whatever you desire) has a princess bed of one sort or another. You deserve the canopy bed! One is royal purple, another precious pink, the other ruby red, and then there\'s sophisticated seafoam. Your room is trimmed in gold with lots of big-eyed pictures and mirrors for you to look at and kiss. ***COMMON SPACE*** Ladie\'s Lounge, office/craft room, dancefloor with pro effects lights, tiki bar, music room/stage, theater with DLP projector. Space to sip wine and fold origami or knit and talk about boys. A place to hang out while trying on vintage shoes or reading 1950\'s Family Circle magazines. Do anything your little golden heart desires. Rates vary depending on length of your stay, the room, and other options. Please check the website for updates and tell all your cutie-patootie friends, k? xoxo

properties.name: Leonid the Ukranian Accordian Player
properties.description: Posted by Jason8440 sw 30th ave, portland, orwent to hear this guy and meet him face to face, to potentially hire as our wedding musician. He meets me in a vacant house (that he is also selling by thte way) in his matching royal blue sweat pant shorts and tank top. He is a tremendously muscular guy with a thick accent and is building himself a new house in the backyard. He proceeds to play with immense enthusiasm while the construction vehicles roll up the driveway. His playing is fantastic, and it\'s only when I\'m standing very close that i can hear his wheezing lungs (or was it the instrument?). I think this is the guy.

Tabor didn\'t like the stilt walkers, emiko was very enthusiastic about the show!
